General.Name: Taiyuan Lionhead Cement Co Ltd
General.Description: Lionhead Technology Development Co.,Ltd. provides e-commerce services in China. The company manufactures and sells water purification faucets and accessories. The company was formerly known as Taiyuan Lionhead Cement Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Lionhead Technology Development Co.,Ltd. in March 2022. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Taiyuan, China.

0.Name: Mr. Gu  Gong
0.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors & Financial Officer
